Package adventure_game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
adventure_game.Game
public class Game extends Object
The class Game represents the game itself. It includes methods for creating a new player, starting combat with an NPC, and running the game loop. The Game class also includes a Scanner object for input and a Random object for generating random numbers.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method of the game, which starts the game loop.
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments (not used in this game)

    • createPlayer

      public void createPlayer()
      Creates a new player for the game. The method prompts the user to enter a name for their character and allocate 20 stat points to health, mana, and base damage. The player object is then created with the specified name and stats, and set as the current player of the game.

    • enterCombat

      public void enterCombat(NPC opponent)
      Initiates a combat between the player and an NPC opponent. The method runs a while loop that repeatedly calls the takeTurn() method of the player and the opponent until one of them dies (their isAlive() method returns false). After the end of the combat, a message is printed indicating which character was slain.
      Parameters:
      opponent - The NPC opponent to fight against.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Returns the current player of the game.
      Returns:
      the current player of the game
